name.ja: 復元古代家屋（出雲玉作史跡公園）
name.en: Reconstructed Ancient House (Izumo Tamatsukuri Historical Park)

description.ja: 記加羅志（きがらし）神社跡古墳、工房跡の原状保存施設、工房跡を示す台座、復元家屋などが整備保存された史跡公園
description.en: Kigarashi Shrine Ruins Kofun, workshop site preservation facility, pedestal indicating workshop site, restored houses, and other preserved features within a historic park

address.ja: 〒699-0201 島根県松江市玉湯町玉造８５−８
address.en: 85-8 Tamatsukuri, Tamayu-cho, Matsue City, Shimane Prefecture 699-0201
